import React, {Fragment, useState} from 'react'; import { Link, withRouter} from 'react-router-dom'; import PropTypes from 'prop-types'; import { connect } from 'react-redux'; import { createProfile} from '../../actions/profile' const CreateProfile = props => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ company: '', website: '', location: '', status: '', skills: '', githubusername: '', bio: '', twitter: '', facebook: '', linkedin: '', youtube: '', instagram: '' }) const [displaySocialInputs, toggleSocialInputs] = useState(false); const { company, website, location, status, skills, githubusername, bio, twitter, facebook, linkedin, youtube, instagram } = formData; const onChange = e => setFormData({ ...formData, [e.target.name]: e.target.value}); return (

Create Your Profile

Let's get some information to make your profile stand out

* = required field
Give us an idea of where you are at in your career
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own company or one you work for
onChange(e)} /> Could be your own or a company website
onChange(e)} /> City & state suggested (eg. Boston, MA)
onChange(e)} /> Please use comma separated values (eg. HTML,CSS,JavaScript,PHP)
If you want your latest repos and a Github link, include your username
Tell us a little about yourself
Optional
{displaySocialInputs &&
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
onChange(e)} />
} Go Back
) } CreateProfile.propTypes = { createprofile: PropTypes.func.isRequired, } export default connect(null, {createProfile})(CreateProfile);
